Knowledge__DataCategorySelection.name: Knowledge__DataCategorySelection
Knowledge__DataCategorySelection.description: Represents a data category that classifies an article

DataCategoryGroupName.description: Unique name of the data category group which has categories associated with the article.

DataCategoryName.description: Unique name of the data category associated with the article.

ParentId.description: ID of the article associated with the data category selection.

Knowledge__DataCategorySelection.accessRules: Lightning Knowledge must be enabled in your org.
